content:

title: Putin invited to join US-led Gaza 'Board of Peace', Trump says
description: Neither the Kremlin nor the US president has confirmed whether Putin has accepted the offer.
content:
President Donald Trump has confirmed he invited Vladimir Putin to join a US-proposed Gaza "Board of Peace".
The board is part of Trump's 20-point plan to end the Israel-Hamas war and expected to temporarily oversee the running of Gaza and manage its ... [3340 chars]

title: How we got great photos of the Northern Lights
description: BBC South's Weather Watchers explain how they captured some stunning shots.
content:
Vivid shades of green, pink and red appeared bright in the skies on Monday evening.
The Northern Lights - also known as the Aurora Borealis - could be seen across the country and many of BBC South's Weather Watchers captured stunning images.
